thread.section_title: Gamecheap Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gamecheap | gamecheap.net | 11 of 69
thread.title: Carol Koskowski

author: Carol Koskowski
title: Carol Koskowski
text: Purchased Windows 10 download which doesn't download directly to computer, so had to purchase 4G flash drive. Customer Service responses were the "stock" answers, (word-for-word of what is on web site). Nowhere does it say you must wipe your hard drive completely - - but that's exactly what is necessary. I know have Windows 10 on a flash drive which I cannot use. $40.00 lost - - lesson learned.
